# List of presidents of the Landtag of the Free People's State of Württemberg

The following is a '''list of presidents of the Landtag of the Free People's State of Württemberg'.
{| class="wikitable"
! Name
! Period
! Party
|-
|Wilhelm Keil
|1919–1920
|SPD
|-
|Karl Walter
|1920–1924
|Zentrum
|-
|Theodor Körner
|1924–1928
|WBWB
|-
|Albert Pflüger
|1928–1932
|SPD
|-
|Christian Mergenthaler
|1932–1933
|NSDAP
|-
|Jonathan Schmid
|1933
|NSDAP
|-
|Karl Waldmann
|1933
|NSDAP
|}
Sources
*Raberg, Frank: Biographische Handbuch der württembergischen Landtagsabgeordneten 1815-1933'', Kohlhammer Verlag Stuttgart 2001
